titleStmt.title: The dread of Gods power, uttering its voice thorough man, unto the heads of the nation. / George Fox the younger.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, d. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Robert Wilson, at the Signe of the Black-Spread-Eagle and Windmil in Martins Le Grand.,

notesStmt.note: At end of text: Lambeth house, 28th 5th month, 1660.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
